description.localized_desc: This normalizer parses common security audit logs from the Windows 2003 Event Log, localized in English. The following event IDs are covered: * 592 to 595 (processes events), * 608 to 612 (Policy change events), * 624, 642, 645, 646 (account management events)

Ce normaliseur traite les logs d'audit de sécurité communs du Journal d'Événéments de Windows 2003, en version anglaise. Les codes d'événements suivants sont normalisés : * 592 to 595 (événements de suivi des processus), * 608 to 612(événements de modification de stratégies), * 624, 642, 645, 646 (événements de gestion des comptes),
A single sign used to display a policy change.
Un simple signe utilisé pour indiquer un changement de politique.

callbacks.callback: decoder = {'SeTcbPrivilege' : 'Ability to act as part of the operating system', 'SeMachineAccountPrivilege' : 'Ability to add workstations to the domain', 'SeIncreaseQuotaPrivilege' : 'Ability to adjust memory quotas for a process', 'SeBackupPrivilege' : 'Ability to back up files and directories', 'SeChangeNotifyPrivilege' : 'Ability to bypass traverse checking', 'SeSystemtimePrivilege' : 'Ability to change the system time', 'SeCreatePagefilePrivilege' : 'Ability to create a pagefile', 'SeCreateTokenPrivilege' : 'Ability to create a token object', 'SeCreatePermanentPrivilege' : 'Ability to create permanent shared objects', 'SeDebugPrivilege' : 'Ability to debug programs', 'SeEnableDelegationPrivilege' : 'Ability to delegate trust on computers and user accounts', 'SeRemoteShutdownPrivilege' : 'Ability to shutdown a system remotely', 'SeAuditPrivilege' : 'Ability to generate security audits', 'SeIncreaseBasePriorityPrivilege' : 'Ability to increase scheduling priority', 'SeLoadDriverPrivilege' : 'Ability to load or unload device drivers', 'SeLockMemoryPrivilege' : 'Ability to lock pages in memory', 'SeSecurityPrivilege' : 'Ability to manage the security event log', 'SeSystemEnvironmentPrivilege' : 'Ability to modify firmware environment values', 'SeManageVolumePrivilege' : 'Ability to perform volume maintenance tasks', 'SeProfileSingleProcessPrivilege' : 'Ability to profile a single process', 'SeSystemProfilePrivilege' : 'Ability to profile the system performances', 'SeUndockPrivilege' : 'Ability to remove the computer from its docking station', 'SeAssignPrimaryTokenPrivilege' : 'Ability to replace a process level token', 'SeRestorePrivilege' : 'Ability to restore files and directories', 'SeShutdownPrivilege' : 'Ability to shut the system down', 'SeSyncAgentPrivilege' : 'Ability to synchronize directory service data', 'SeTakeOwnershipPrivilege' : 'Ability to take ownership of files or other objects', } log['user_right_description'] = decoder.get(value, 'UNKNOWN')
decoder = { '1': 'NT 4.0 legacy trust', '2' : 'Kerberos realm trust', '3' : 'forest or domain trust with another active directory domain', } log['trust_type'] = decoder.get(value, 'UNKNOWN')

pattern.name: eventID-00592
pattern.text: A new process has been created: New Process ID: _PID_ Image File Name: _FILENAME_ Creator Process ID: _CPID_ User Name: _USER_ Domain: _DOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_

example.text: A new process has been created: New Process ID: 2167588800 Image File Name: \WINNT\system32\notepad.exe Creator Process ID: 2167187648 User Name: administrator Domain: ELMW2 Logon ID: (0x0,0x804C2)

pattern.name: eventID-00593
pattern.text: A process has exited: Process ID: _PID_ Image File Name: _FILENAME_ User Name: _USER_ Domain: _DOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_

example.text: A process has exited: Process ID: 2084 Image File Name: C:\WINDOWS\system32\notepad.exe User Name: administrator Domain: ELM Logon ID: (0x0,0x158EB7)

pattern.name: eventID-00594
pattern.text: A handle to an object has been duplicated: Source Handle ID: _HANDLEID_ Source Process ID: _PID_ Target Handle ID: _TARGETHANDLEID_ Target Process ID: _TARGETPID_

example.text:
A handle to an object has been duplicated:
Source Handle ID: 1064 Source Process ID: 796 Target Handle ID: 1072 Target Process ID: 796

pattern.name: eventID-00595

description.localized_desc: Indirect access to an object has been granted
Accès indirect à un objet accordé

pattern.text: Indirect access to an object has been obtained: Object Type: _OBJTYPE_ Object Name: _OBJNAME_ Process ID: _PID_ Primary User Name: _USER_ Primary Domain: _DOMAIN_ Primary Logon ID: _LOGONID_ Client User Name: _CLIENTUSER_ Client Domain: _CLIENTDOMAIN_ Client Logon ID: _CLID_ Accesses: _ACCESSES_(?: Access Mask: _ACCESSMASK_)?

pattern.name: eventID-00608
pattern.text: User Right Assigned: User Right: _USERRIGHT_ Assigned To: _USER_ Assigned By: User Name: _USERNAME_ Domain: _DOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_

description.localized_desc: The system name of the assigned user right
Le nom système du droit assigné à l'utilisateur
The user who assigned the right
Le nom de l'utilisateur qui a assigné le droit

example.text: User Right Assigned: User Right: SeUndockPrivilege Assigned To: MTG\rsmith Assigned By: User Name: MTG1$ Domain: MTG Logon ID: (0x0,0x3E7)

expectedTags.expectedTag: Ability to remove the computer from its docking station

pattern.name: eventID-00609
pattern.text: User Right Removed: User Right: _USERRIGHT_ Removed From: _USER_ Removed By: User Name: _USERNAME_ Domain: _DOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_

description.localized_desc: The system name of the removed user right
Le nom système du droit retiré à l'utilisateur
The user who removed the right
Le nom de l'utilisateur qui a retiré le droit

example.text: User Right Removed: User Right: SeManageVolumePrivilege Removed From: ACME\wsmith Removed By: User Name: administrator Domain: ACME Logon ID: (0x0,0x12526E)

expectedTags.expectedTag: Ability to perform volume maintenance tasks

pattern.name: eventID-00610
pattern.text: New Trusted Domain: Domain Name: _DOMAIN_ Domain ID: _DOMAINID_ Established By: User Name: _USER_ Domain: _USERDOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_ Trust Type: _TRUSTTYPE_ Trust Direction: _TRUSTDIRECTION_ Trust Attributes: _TRUSTATTRIBUTES_ SID Filtering: _FILTERING_

description.localized_desc: Le code du sens de la relation de confiance
Le code du type de niveau de confiance
Le code des attributs de la relation de confiance
Le statut du filtrage par SID

example.text: New Trusted Domain: Domain Name: SouthAmerica Domain ID: - Established By: User Name: administrator Domain: ELM Logon ID: (0x0,0x158EB7) Trust Type: 3 Trust Direction: 2 Trust Attributes: 1 SID Filtering: Disabled

expectedTags.expectedTag: forest or domain trust with another active directory domain

pattern.name: eventID-00611
pattern.text: Trusted Domain Removed: Domain Name: _DOMAIN_ Domain ID: _DOMAINID_ Removed By: User Name: _USER_ Domain: _USERDOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_

example.text: Trusted Domain Removed: Domain Name: SouthAmerica Domain ID: - Removed By: User Name: administrator Domain: ELM Logon ID: (0x0,0x158EB7)

pattern.name: eventID-00612

description.localized_desc: Audit Policy Change. Changes are marked with a + if enabled, a - if disabled
Changement de politique d'audit. Les changements sont signalés par un + en cas d'activation, un - en cas de désactivation

pattern.text: Audit Policy Change: New Policy: Success Failure _LOGSUCCESS_ _LOGFAIL_ Logon/Logoff _OBJSUCCESS_ _OBJFAIL_ Object Access _PRIVSUCCESS_ _PRIVFAIL_ Privilege Use _ACCTMGMTSUCCESS_ _ACCTMGMTFAIL_ Account Management _POLCHANGESUCCESS_ _POLCHANGEFAIL_ Policy Change _SYSTEMSUCCESS_ _SYSTEMFAIL_ System _TRACKINGSUCCESS_ _TRACKINGFAIL_ Detailed Tracking _DSASUCCESS_ _DSAFAIL_ Directory Service Access _ACCTLOGONSUCCESS_ _ACCTLOGONFAIL_ Account Logon Changed By: User Name: _USER_ Domain Name: _DOMAIN_ Logon ID: _LOGONID_

description.localized_desc: La politique d'audit des succès de connexion et de déconnexion
La politique d'audit des échecs de connexion et de déconnexion
the object access success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès d'accès aux objets
the object access failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs d'accès aux objets
the privilege use success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès d'usage des privilèges
the privilege use failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs d'usage des privilèges
the account management success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès de gestions des comptes
the account management failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs de gestions des comptes
the policy change success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès de changement de politique
the policy change failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs de changement de politique
La politique d'audit des succès système
La politique d'audit des échecs système
the detailed tracking success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès de suivi détaillé
the detailed tracking failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs de suivi détaillé
the directory service access success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès d'accès au service d'annuaire
the directory service access failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs d'accès au service d'annuaire
the account logon success audit policy
La politique d'audit des succès de connexion de compte
the account logon failure audit policy
La politique d'audit des échecs de connexion de compte

example.text:
Audit Policy Change: New Policy: Success Failure + + Logon/Logoff + + Object Access - + Privilege Use + + Account Management - + Policy Change + - System + + Detailed Tracking + + Directory Service Access + + Account Logon
Changed By: User Name: Alebovsky Domain Name: RESEARCH Logon ID: (0x0,0x59DF36)

pattern.name: eventID-00624-00642-00645-00646
pattern.text: (?:Computer|User) Account (?:Created|Changed): (?:_ACTION_ )?(?:New|Target) Account Name: _NEWUSER_ (?:New|Target) Domain: _NEWDOMAIN_ (?:Target|New) Account ID: _ACCTID_ Caller User Name: _USER_ Caller Domain: _DOMAIN_ Caller Logon ID: _LOGONID_ Privileges:? _PRIVILEGES_ (?:Changed )?Attributes: Sam Account Name: _SAMACCT_ Display Name: _DISPLAYNAME_ User Principal Name: _DN_ Home Directory: _HOMEDIR_ Home Drive: _HOMEDRIVE_ Script Path: _SCRIPTPATH_ Profile Path: _PROFILEPATH_ User Workstations: _WORKSTATIONS_ Password Last Set: _PWDLASTSET_ Account Expires: _EXPIRYDATE_ Primary Group ID: _PGID_ AllowedToDelegateTo: _DELEGATETO_ Old UAC Value: _OLDUAC_ New UAC Value: _NEWUAC_ User Account Control: _ACCTCONTROL_ User Parameters: _USERPARAMS_ Sid History: _SIDHISTORY_ Logon Hours: _LOGONHOURS_(?: DNS Host Name: _DNSHOSTNAME_)?(?: Service Principal Names: _SERVICEPRINCIPALNAMES_)?

description.localized_desc: The type of change, in case of a computer account change
Le type de changement, dans le cas d'un changement de compte d'ordinateur
The domain of the target user
The account ID of the created user
L'identifiant de compte de l'utilisateur créé
The domain of the user creating the account
le domaine de l'utilisateur créant le nouveau compte
The logon ID of the user creating the account
l'identifiant de session de l'utilisateur créant le nouveau compte
an unidentified field, empty most of the time
un champ non identifié, vide la plupart du temps
le nom de compte utilisé par les clients de version antérieure à windows 2003
the full user name, in an email format, with either the domain address or the domain's distinguished name
le nom d'utilisateur complet, au format email, accompagné soit de l'adresse de domaine, soit du nom distingué du domaine
the path to the user's logon script
le chemin vers le script de démarrage de l'utilisateur
the path to the user's profile
le chemin vers le profil de l'utilisateur
the workstations from which the user can log on
les postes de travail depuis lesquels l'utilisateur peut se connecter
the date at which the password was last set
la date de dernier changement du mot de passe
the expiry date of the account
the list of Service Principal Names to which the user can forward credentials
la liste des Noms Principaux de Services auxquels l'utilisateur peut transférer ses crédences
the bitwise value of User Account Control options (old)
l'ancienne valeur en bits des options d'UAC (User Account Control)
the bitwise value of User Account Control options (new)
la nouvelle valeur en bits des options d'UAC (User Account Control)
les paramètres utilisateurs spécifiques et optionnels
the previous SID of the user, in case it was moved from a domain
les précédents SID de l'utilisateur, si celui-ci provient d'un autre domaine

example.text: User Account Created: New Account Name: Naruto New Domain: KONOHA New Account ID: {S-1-5-21-184992632-1607737289-1287950321-1178} Caller User Name: Hokage Caller Domain: KONOHA Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x59DF36) Privileges - Attributes: Sam Account Name: Naruto Display Name: Naruto Uzumaki User Principal Name: Naruto@dc=konoha,dc=shinobi Home Directory: - Home Drive: - Script Path: - Profile Path: - User Workstations: - Password Last Set: <never> Account Expires: <never> Primary Group ID: 513 AllowedToDelegateTo: - Old UAC Value: 0x0 New UAC Value: 0x15 User Account Control: Account Disabled 'Password Not Required' - Enabled 'Normal Account' - Enabled User Parameters: - Sid History: - Logon Hours: <value not set>

expectedTags.expectedTag: Account Disabled 'Password Not Required' - Enabled 'Normal Account' - Enabled

example.text: User Account Changed: Target Account Name: alicej Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: ELMW2\alicej Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x1469C1) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Display Name: - User Principal Name: - Home Directory: - Home Drive: - Script Path: - Profile Path: - User Workstations: - Password Last Set: - Account Expires: <never> Primary Group ID: - AllowedToDelegateTo: - Old UAC Value: - New UAC Value: - User Account Control: - User Parameters: - Sid History: - Logon Hours: -

Computer Account Created: New Account Name: COMP1$ New Domain: ELMW2 New Account ID: comp1 Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges - Attributes: Sam Account Name: FILESERVER12$ Display Name: - User Principal Name: - Home Directory: - Home Drive: - Script Path: - Profile Path: - User Workstations: - Password Last Set: - Account Expires: - Primary Group ID: 515 AllowedToDelegateTo: - Old UAC Value: 0x0 New UAC Value: 0x85 User Account Control: Account Disabled 'Password Not Required' - Enabled 'Workstation Trust Account' - Enabled User Parameters: - Sid History: - Logon Hours: - DNS Host Name: - Service Principal Names: -

expectedTags.expectedTag: Account Disabled 'Password Not Required' - Enabled 'Workstation Trust Account' - Enabled

example.text: Computer Account Changed: Account Enabled. Target Account Name: COMP1$ Target Domain: ELMW2 Target Account ID: comp1 Caller User Name: Administrator Caller Domain: ELMW2 Caller Logon ID: (0x0,0x12D622) Privileges: - Changed Attributes: Sam Account Name: - Display Name: - User Principal Name: - Home Directory: - Home Drive: - Script Path: - Profile Path: - User Workstations: - Password Last Set: - Account Expires: - Primary Group ID: - AllowedToDelegateTo: - Old UAC Value: - New UAC Value: - User Account Control: - User Parameters: - Sid History: - Logon Hours: - DNS Host Name: - Service Principal Names: -
